_meanings:
{@--2@} To weigh in the
mind, ponder, consider.

{@--7@} To make light of, 
contemn, despise; {#aMtaHsAraM Gana#} 
{#tulayituM nAnilaH Sakzyati tvAM#} <ls>Me. 20</ls>
(where {#tu#}. also means ‘to bear up
or carry away’); <ls>Śi. 15. 30.</ls>

{@--11@} To have
in the same degree, attain or
reach to.
